title: serial font
content:
Any idea what font is used for these serial numbers?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [acode.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803011528/http:/typophile.com/files/acode.jpg) | 3.82 KB |
author: fouga

comments.content: Right: firstly thought to [Bank Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803011528/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Bank+gothic) but digits don't match at all. Then found [Deluxe Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803011528/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/alphabetsoup/deluxe-gothic) and [Banque Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803011528/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/banque-gothique-rr) that could fit your needs.
